name: React Native Common Components
details: Comprehensive library of production-ready React Native components including Button, TextInput, Dialog, FlatList, and more.

name: React Native Template
details: Production-ready React Native template with multi-module architecture, Redux Toolkit state management, and TanStack Query for data fetching.

Comprehensive dev tooling: Lefthook + commitlint, Jest testing, Fastlane automation, asset linking, and support for iOS/Android flavor variants.
